title: Champ select bug
body:
So over the last 2 days, I've encounted an annoying bug where I can enter game, ban a champ, and then it just freezes and since I can't lock in a game it gets counted as a dodge. I currently have a 30min dodge timer for something that isn't even my fault. It happens maybe once every third game.

As much as I love waiting 30min to even queue for a game, can you fix your client. Thanks

replies.body:
To clarify, this is an issue with *your* client (or connection), not *the* client.

Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

If that doesn't work try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

If that still doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.
